relation: There's so many different opportunities for students to get involved on campus.
Although Mount Union is a more expensive school, they offer quite a few scholarships. The best part is that the scholarships are much more generous than other school's scholarships.
There's a variety of Food and Dining plans, which is nice.
I was impressed with the dorms! Not as large as some dorm rooms I've seen, but not bad.
I suggest visiting the school. As soon as I stepped foot on campus, I could see myself attending. I've visited 3 times, and the campus is beautiful. A visit is a must!

The University of Mount Union was among several schools that I applied to. It was the first school that I visited, applied to, the first that I was accepted to. It made the college search so much easier, and that's not even mentioning the amazing opportunities that Mount Union has to offer.
pageTitle: University of Mount Union Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {130411=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 104400=The food is good as a whole. They have a large amount of healthy food to choose from. They need to change up the selections, they seem to have the same meals alot. It would be nice if the cafeteria was open later. There are many athletes on campus and sometimes I am at practice longer and the cafeteria closes at 7:00 before I get home. I miss out on dinner. And on Sunday they close at 5:00 so we have to eat dinner at 4:00. Way to early., 106129=Sheets is a great place to eat late night and Chipotle is just down the street if you're hungry. Sunday the cafeteria is only open until 5:00 so don't forget to get there in the late afternoon or you have to buy your dinner somewhere else.}

textAfterTable: The University of Mount Union may be expensive, but there is not a school more generous with scholarships. By the time you receive your scholarships, you will be paying a great price for an even better education. Am enjoying being here The facilities are great. Everything you'll ever want is within walking distance. Am learning a lot Mount Union sets up an excellent community of educational and social opportunities. Not only will you learn a lot about your field of study, but you will gain the tools necessary to go out and succeed in the world. Socially, Mount Union is the place to be for friendship and professional networking. Login to rate or flag the reviews Allison from Minerva, OH 12/01/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 3 of 30 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Music Students Education Students
